name: linear_test

variables.name: item_debug
variables.description: 1 to turn item debug mode on. 0 to turn it off. Item debug mode let's you specify which item you want to view from your item bank.

params.label: Response width
params.description: Can be any valid CSS width property value. E.g.: 200px, 20%.
params.name: response_width

params.label: Item bank
params.description: For open question leave item response options list empty.
params.name: item_bank
